title: Calligraphy
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Calligraphy**

Calligraphy is a sort of [Lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lettering) that is hand made, using some kind of writing instrument for assistance.

Some major calligraphic hands or scripts include:  
 [Rustic Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rustic%20Capitals)  
 [Square Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Square%20Capitals)  
 [Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Uncial)  
 [Artifical Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Artifical%20Uncial)  
 [Insular Majuscule](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Insular%20Majuscule)  
 [Insular Miniscule](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Insular%20Miniscule)  
 [Carolingian Minuscule](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Carolingian%20Minuscule)  
 [Foundational Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundational%20Hand)  
 [Early Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Early%20Gothic)  
 [Textura Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Textura%20Quadrata)  
 [Textura Prescisus](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Textura%20Prescisus)  
 [Gothic Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gothic%20Capitals)  
 [Versals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Versals)  
 [Lombardic Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lombardic%20Capitals)  
 [Bastard Secretary](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bastard%20Secretary)  
 [Batarde](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Batarde)  
 [Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fraktur)  
 [Schwabacher](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Schwabacher)  
 [Bastard Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bastard%20Capitals)  
 [Cadels](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cadels)  
 [Rotunda](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rotunda)  
 [Humanist Minuscule](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Humanist%20Minuscule)  
 [Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Italic)  
 [Italic Swash Caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Swash%20Caps)  
 [Copperplate](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Copperplate)  
 [Imperial Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20120813223801/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Imperial%20Capitals)
author: paul d hunt
